tokens.text: can be interacted with by players
consumes the held item when interacted with
transforms the used item on interaction

fields.description: The list of interactions for this entity.

fields.title: Particle On Start
fields.description: Particle effect that will be triggered at the start of the interaction.

subForm.description: Particle effect that will be triggered at the start of the interaction.

fields.title: Particle Offset Towards Interactor
fields.description: Whether or not the particle will appear closer to who performed the interaction.

fields.title: Particle Type
fields.description: The type of particle that will be spawned.

fields.title: Particle Y Offset
fields.description: Will offset the particle this amount in the y direction.

fields.title: Play Sounds
fields.description: List of sounds to play when the interaction occurs.

fields.title: Repair Entity Item
fields.description: Allows to repair one of the entity's items.

subForm.description: Allows to repair one of the entity's items.

fields.title: Amount
fields.description: How much of the item durability should be restored upon interaction.

fields.title: Slot
fields.description: The entity's slot containing the item to be repaired. Inventory slots are denoted by positive numbers. Armor slots are denoted by 'slot.armor.head', 'slot.armor.chest', 'slot.armor.legs', 'slot.armor.feet' and 'slot.armor.body'.

fields.title: Spawn Entities
fields.description: List of entities to spawn when the interaction occurs.

fields.title: Spawn Items
fields.description: Loot table with items to drop on the ground upon successful interaction.

subForm.description: Loot table with items to drop on the ground upon successful interaction.

fields.title: Table
fields.description: File path, relative to the Behavior Pack's path, to the loot table file.

fields.title: Y Offset
fields.description: Will offset the items spawn position this amount in the y direction.

fields.title: Swing
fields.description: If true, the player will do the 'swing' animation when interacting with this entity.

fields.title: Transform To Item
fields.description: The item used will transform to this item upon successful interaction. Format: itemName:auxValue

fields.title: Use Item
fields.description: If true, the interaction will use an item.

fields.title: Vibration
fields.description: Vibration to emit when the interaction occurs. Admitted values are none (no vibration emitted), shear, entity_die, entity_act, entity_interact.

fields.title: On Interact
fields.description: Event to fire when the interaction occurs. Can be a string event name or an object with filters.

fields.title: Give Item
fields.description: If true, the player can give items to the entity during interaction.

fields.title: Take Item
fields.description: If true, the player can take items from the entity during interaction.

fields.title: Swing
fields.description: If true, the player will do the 'swing' animation when interacting with this entity.

fields.title: Use Item
fields.description: If true, the interaction will use an item.

fields.title: Add Items
fields.description: Loot table with items to add to the player's inventory upon successful interaction.

subForm.description: Loot table with items to add to the player's inventory upon successful interaction.

fields.title: Table
fields.description: File path, relative to the Behavior Pack's path, to the loot table file.

fields.title: Cooldown
fields.description: Time in seconds before this entity can be interacted with again.

fields.title: Cooldown After Being Attacked
fields.description: Time in seconds before this entity can be interacted with after being attacked.

fields.title: Drop Item Slot
fields.description: The entity's slot to remove and drop the item from, if any, upon successful interaction. Inventory slots are denoted by positive numbers. Equipment slots are denoted by 'slot.weapon.mainhand', 'slot.weapon.offhand', 'slot.armor.head', 'slot.armor.chest', 'slot.armor.legs', 'slot.armor.feet' and 'slot.armor.body'.

fields.title: Drop Item y Offset
fields.description: Will offset the item drop position this amount in the y direction. Requires "drop_item_slot" to be specified.

fields.title: Equip Item Slot
fields.description: The entity's slot to equip the item to, if any, upon successful interaction. Inventory slots are denoted by positive numbers. Equipment slots are denoted by 'slot.weapon.mainhand', 'slot.weapon.offhand', 'slot.armor.head', 'slot.armor.chest', 'slot.armor.legs', 'slot.armor.feet' and 'slot.armor.body'.

fields.title: Health Amount
fields.description: The amount of health this entity will recover or lose when interacting with this item. Negative values will harm the entity.

fields.title: Hurt Item
fields.description: The amount of damage the item will take when used to interact with this entity. A value of 0 means the item won't lose durability.

fields.title: Interact Text
fields.description: Text to show when the player is able to interact in this way with this entity when playing with touch-screen controls.

fields.title: Interact
fields.description: Event to fire when the interaction occurs.

fields.title: Particle On Start
fields.description: Particle effect that will be triggered at the start of the interaction.

subForm.description: Particle effect that will be triggered at the start of the interaction.

fields.title: Particle Offset Towards Interactor
fields.description: Whether or not the particle will appear closer to who performed the interaction.

fields.title: Particle Type
fields.description: The type of particle that will be spawned.

fields.title: Particle y Offset
fields.description: Will offset the particle this amount in the y direction.

fields.title: Play Sounds
fields.description: List of sounds to play when the interaction occurs.

fields.title: Repair Entity Item
fields.description: Allows to repair one of the entity's items.

subForm.description: Allows to repair one of the entity's items.

fields.title: Amount
fields.description: How much of the item durability should be restored upon interaction.

fields.title: Slot
fields.description: The entity's slot containing the item to be repaired. Inventory slots are denoted by positive numbers. Equipment slots are denoted by 'slot.weapon.mainhand', 'slot.weapon.offhand', 'slot.armor.head', 'slot.armor.chest', 'slot.armor.legs', 'slot.armor.feet' and 'slot.armor.body'.

fields.title: Spawn Entities
fields.description: List of entities to spawn when the interaction occurs.

fields.title: Spawn Items
fields.description: Loot table with items to drop on the ground upon successful interaction.

subForm.description: Loot table with items to drop on the ground upon successful interaction.

fields.title: Table
fields.description: File path, relative to the Behavior Pack's path, to the loot table file.

fields.title: y Offset
fields.description: Will offset the items spawn position this amount in the y direction.

fields.title: Swing
fields.description: If true, the player will do the 'swing' animation when interacting with this entity.

fields.title: Transform To Item
fields.description: The item used will transform to this item upon successful interaction. Format: itemName:auxValue

fields.title: Use Item
fields.description: If true, the interaction will use an item.

fields.title: Vibration
fields.description: Vibration to emit when the interaction occurs. Admitted values are none (no vibration emitted), shear, entity_die, entity_act, entity_interact.
